text:
NATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF EDUCATIONAL BROADCASTERS
Box 2002
University, Alabama
December 7, 1953
Dr. Arthur S. Adams, President
American Council on Education
1785 Massachusetts Avenue
Washington 6, D. C#
Dear Dr. Adamsi
I regret very much that neither Dr. Harry Skornia, Executive Director
of NAEB, nor I will be able to attend the American Council on Education
meeting on January 15 and 16. We have another meeting scheduled which we
cannot miss.
This, obviously, will be an important meeting and I regret that we
will not be represented. I trust, however, that you will provide us with
any materials and recommendations which are an out-growth of the meeting
and will call on us for any action needed from us.
Jfy very kindest regards.
Sincerely,
OA/sbr
Oraydon Ausmus
President
